AssignmentReportProperties.description: Data related to the report detail.

startTime.description: Start time of the configuration profile assignment processing.

endTime.description: End time of the configuration profile assignment processing.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last modified time of the configuration profile assignment processing.

duration.description: Duration of the configuration profile assignment processing.

type.description: Type of the configuration profile assignment processing (Initial/Consistency).

status.description: The status of the configuration profile assignment.

configurationProfile.description: The configurationProfile linked to the assignment.

resources.description: List of resources processed by the configuration profile assignment.

error.description: Error message, if any, returned by the configuration profile assignment processing.

BestPractice.description: Definition of the Automanage best practice.

id.description: The fully qualified ID for the best practice.  For example, /providers/Microsoft.Automanage/bestPractices/azureBestPracticesProduction

type.description: The type of the resource.  For example, Microsoft.Automanage/bestPractices

name.description: The name of the best practice. For example, azureBestPracticesProduction

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

BestPracticeList.description: The response of the list best practice operation.

value.description: Result of the list best practice operation.

ConfigurationDictionary.description: The custom configuration for configuration profile. Name and value pairs that define the configuration details of the configuration profile.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ConfigurationProfileAssignment.description: Configuration profile assignment is an association between a VM and automanage profile configuration.

properties.description: Properties of the configuration profile assignment.

managedBy.description: Azure resource id. Indicates if this resource is managed by another Azure resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ConfigurationProfileAssignmentList.description: The response of the list configuration profile assignment operation.

value.description: Result of the list configuration profile assignment operation.

configurationProfile.description: The Automanage configurationProfile ARM Resource URI.

status.description: The status of onboarding, which only appears in the response.

ConfigurationProfileList.description: The response of the list configuration profile operation.

value.description: Result of the list ConfigurationProfile operation.

configuration.title: configuration
configuration.description: configuration dictionary of the configuration profile.

ManagedBy.description: Azure resource id. Indicates if this resource is managed by another Azure resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ReportList.description: The response of the list report operation.

value.description: Result of the list report operation.

ReportResource.description: Details about the resource processed by the configuration profile assignment

error.description: Error message, if any, returned when deploying the resource.

ServicePrincipal.description: The Service Principal Id for the subscription.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: The Service Principal properties for the subscription

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ServicePrincipalProperties.description: The Service Principal properties for the subscription.

servicePrincipalId.description: The Service Principal Id for the subscription.

authorizationSet.description: Returns the contributor RBAC Role exist or not for the Service Principal Id.
